version_description:
- Bug fixes
- Chinese, Japanese and Korean languages fixed for iOS 8.2

In-App Store:
- All-in-one bundle unlock option

All In-App Purchases are restorable. To restore previously purchased content tap ‘Restore’ button on the upper right in the In-App Store.

- Bug fixes
- Chinese, Japanese and Korean languages fixed for iOS 8.2

In-App Store:
- All-in-one bundle unlock option

All In-App Purchases are restorable. To restore previously purchased content tap ‘Restore’ button on the upper right in the In-App Store.

- Bug fixes
- Chinese, Japanese and Korean languages fixed for iOS 8.2

In-App Store:
- All-in-one bundle unlock option

All In-App Purchases are restorable. To restore previously purchased content tap ‘Restore’ button on the upper right in the In-App Store.

- Bug fixes
- Chinese, Japanese and Korean languages fixed for iOS 8.2

In-App Store:
- All-in-one bundle unlock option

All In-App Purchases are restorable. To restore previously purchased content tap ‘Restore’ button on the upper right in the In-App Store.

- Compatible with iOS 9 and latest iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s+
- iOS 64-bit support,
- Fixed Japanese, Chinese and Korean
- Performance improvement
- Minor bug fixes

- Compatible with iOS 9 and latest iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s+
- iOS 64-bit support,
- Fixed Japanese, Chinese and Korean
- Performance improvement
- Minor bug fixes

Improvements:

New look of Pluto (the new photos received from the mission New Horizons are used)
The onscreen inscriptions and interface details disappear when unnecessary

Lots of bug fixes:

Pictures of objects in Info section
Some bugs in localizations
App crashes when viewing internal structure of the planets
Blinking when viewing the planets in high resolution
Interface and text for watching films on the external display

Dear Astronomy lover!

We’ve upgraded our Solar System app to a new level. Full iPhone X, 8 and 8 Plus support is available with this update. If you have any questions, please, let us know. You can leave your feedback on Solar Walk in the app menu. We are grateful for all your comments and suggestions.

Thanks for using Solar Walk!

Dear Astronomy Lovers!

Thanks for using Solar Walk. We update the app regularly to make it better for you. This release brings bug fixes and performance improvements that will help you explore the Solar system.

Keep the reviews coming in! We appreciate all the feedback.
